creditline: Gift of Jill Bonovitz and Nancy Hellebrand in honor of their mother, Janet Fleisher
description: various small images including a hand with an eye on the palm, a dog's head, a cup, a man wearing a white hat smoking a hand-rolled cigarette (with cut-out eyes), a head wearing a black helmet with animal ears (with a cut-out rectangle on front), devil face and a gun; various words and short phrases
medium: Colored pencil and graphite on pale yellow paper
provenance: Janet Fleisher Investment Corp., Philadelphia; given to MIA, 2016.
title: New Deal
